channel.title: CVE Feed for LJ Apps -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LJ Apps -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-51685|2024-06-27T19:36:11.583Z -- lj%20apps -- wp%20review%20slider
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in LJ Apps WP Review Slider allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Review Slider: from n/a through 12.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-35630|2024-06-04T17:34:32.211Z -- lj%20apps -- wp%20tripadvisor%20review%20slider
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in LJ Apps WP TripAdvisor Review Slider allows Blind SQL Injection.This issue affects WP TripAdvisor Review Slider: from n/a through 12.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-51685|2024-02-01T10:37:07.931Z -- lj%20apps -- wp%20review%20slider
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in LJ Apps WP Review Slider allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Review Slider: from n/a through 12.7.
